job.title: Junior Web Developer
job.description: <p>We are currently looking for&nbsp;<strong>Jr. WordPress Web Developers</strong>&nbsp;who are passionate, innovative and motivated to make a difference.</p><p><strong>Responsibilities include:</strong></p><ul><li>The developer’s primary focus will be to assist the development team in developing WordPress sites, testing, deployment, and site updates.</li><li>Utilize HTML / CSS to troubleshoot and edit issues and updates to sites through the production lifecycle.</li><li>Continue to learn best practices for developing responsive websites and WordPress themes.</li></ul><p><strong>Desired Skills &amp; Experience</strong>:</p><ul><li>Ability to communicate and work in a team environment.</li><li>Must have experience working with WordPress.</li><li>Organizational skills, work management, ability to prioritize, identify, and resolve issues.</li></ul><p><strong>Qualifications</strong>:</p><ul><li>Thorough knowledge of HTML(5), CSS(3), WordPress</li><li>Solid understanding of responsive design and development practices</li><li>Experience in web development industry</li><li>Knowledge of cross-browser testing and common issues.</li><li>Ability to use Photoshop.</li></ul><p><strong>Company Perks:</strong></p><ul><li>Bonuses</li><li>Incredible company culture with laid-back atmosphere</li><li>Company events throughout the year</li><li>Work with a great team of people</li><li>Full benefits package including medical, vision, dental and 401K</li></ul><p><br></p>
